price: Bashoka bahona. Hanyuma, aho bari mu kuzimu bacishwa mu bihano vy’umuriro igitondo n’umugoroba[4], no ku musi w’izuka ry’ibiremwa, abamalayika bacungereye umuriro bazobwirwa bati: “Nimushire abantu ba Firawuni mu bihano bikaze vyo mu muriro”.
arabic: ٱلنَّارُ يُعۡرَضُونَ عَلَيۡهَا غُدُوّٗا وَعَشِيّٗاۚ وَيَوۡمَ تَقُومُ ٱلسَّاعَةُ أَدۡخِلُوٓاْ ءَالَ فِرۡعَوۡنَ أَشَدَّ ٱلۡعَذَابِ
footnotes: [4] Iyi Aayah, ni icemezo gikwiye mu kwemeza ko ibihano vyo mu mva ari ivy’ukuri.

meta.transliteration: al-nāru yuʿ'raḍūna ʿalayhā ghuduwwan waʿashiyyan wayawma taqūmu al-sāʿatu adkhilū āla fir'ʿawna ashadda al-ʿadhābi
